summary: Saved game after all guilds have finished, and the war is over.
descriptionHtml:
Lev 50 Imperiel  but if you want you can de level her. The ENB im using in the pics is Winterheart II  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21350

Gothic Girl is a save for myself, when i want to start dawnguard again but don\'t want to go through all the beginning stuff. It was started on a clean save. I use mostly mods for armors and weapons, including the Witcher Experience. Not sure if you will need it tho.
I have finished The Thieves Guild, The Companions, and Dark Brotherhood. I am up to Throat of the world in the Main Quest Line. In Dawnguard, I an just starting The Awakening. I have not got Serana yet.

She is  not Married.  

She is wearing Dragonbone Ebonsteel Armor in the save in Whiterun  She has 100 in Archery, smithing, and i think Enchanting. Her sneak is high. She can use any weapon well. I did not hoarde stuff, i sold it to make money.

Download this http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9458  to change your look without crashing game. It adds a ring to your inventory (in my game) when you put it on, you\'ll be transported to a cave to change your looks. 

Mods You will need.
Apachii Hairs all files
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
High-Res Female Nord Skin ( yeah i know, she is a imperiel, i changed her race and forgot this, not sure if it will make a difference.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25531
Better Females By Bella Natural Edition
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Better Females by Bella 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113
Women of Skyrim Face textures
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25588
Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483

Other Mods i was using
Smooth Faces  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971
The Eyes of Beauty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Skyrim and Dawnguard Unofficial updates.

I own all basic houses but for some reason i cant get the children s room, so i downloaded mods to improve Honeyside and proudspire. See below. If you can fix this problem please let me know. 
My follower was Atvir Dres  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19348

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20959  Honeyside Sweetener
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22337  Proudspire Manor- Inventors Spire and Suite 


If you have any problems let me know and ill do what i can to help.

If you just want to complain, you will be wasting your breath because i won\'t listen. I know there are spelling mistakes in this, but my hands are really sore, today.

When life gives you a keyboard,
make a bunny rabbit. 

(\\ (\\
(=\'.\')
((^)(^)
author: Lycanheart
